statement.p: Find the perimeter and area of the parallelogram above. Side lengths are measurements.

solution.p: Perimeter is the sum of the sides: \displaystyle{2}{\left({4.77}+{5.14}\right)}={19.82}\approx{19.82}.
Area is height times base (side perpendicular to height): \displaystyle{5.14}\cdot{4.77}={24.5178}\approx{24.5}.
